title: IT Cybersecurity Specialist
body:
Our client is a global leader in the design and distribution of innovative implantable medical devices that improve the quality of life of patients all over the globe. To maintain high level of IT security standards, our client has tasked us with identifying and recruiting IT Cybersecurity Specialist to be based in Austria.

Key responsibilities of the position will involve:

  • Plan, research and design robust security architectures for IT projects
  • Research security standards, security systems and authentication protocols
  • Prepare cost estimates and identify integration issues
  • Define, implement and maintain corporate IT security policies and procedures
  • Collaborate with company CSO in overseeing IT security awareness programs and educational efforts


Candidates should closely match the following reference profile:

  • Hands-on knowledge and experience in risk assessment procedures, information policy, role-based authorization methodologies, authentication technologies and security attack pathologies
  • Familiarity with ISO 2700/27002, ITIL and COBIT frameworks
  • Knowledge of practices and methods of IT strategy, enterprise architecture and security architecture
  • Knowledge of 3rd party auditing and cloud risk assessment methodologies
  • Strategic problem-solver with excellent communication skills as well as self-reliant personality
  • Fluent in English and German
